songs.title: Give me a resson
songs.lyrics:
Right from the start you were a thief you stole my heart and I was your willing victim and I showed you the parts of me that were not all that pretty and with every touch you fix them
Now you've been talking in your sleep (oh-oo)
All those things you never say to me (oh-oo)
Just tell me you had e-enough of our love, our love!

Just give me a Resson just little bits enough just a secount we're not broken just bent and we can learn to love again!
It's in the stars written between the scars of our hearts we're not broken just bent and we can learn to love again!

I'm sorry I don't understand were all this is coming from I thought that we were fine (Your head is running wild)
Your head is running wild again my dear we still have every thing. and it's all in your mind (Yea but it's happning)
You have been having real bad dreams (oh-oo)
You uest to lye so close to me (oh-oo)
Now there is only emtey sheets between our love our love

[Hook]
